remarks: The join of a poset commutes.  (This may not be a theorem under other definitions of meet.)  (Contributed by NM, 16-Sep-2011.) (New usage is discouraged.)  (Proof modification is discouraged.)
statement:
joincom.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
joincom.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
joincomALT $p |- ( ( K e. V /\ X e. B /\ Y e. B ) -> ( X .\/ Y ) = ( Y .\/ X ) ) $.
